reviews.name: Nicole S.
reviews.content: Mr. Schwab was referred to me by three other attorneys for a Chapter 13. I am so thankful that they directed me to him. I would absolutely recommend him and not just to the public but to my family and friends as well.

reviews.name: Glen S.
reviews.content: My Wife and I had an awesome experience with Mr. Schwab. We found ourselves in a very unique situation and Mr Schwab bailed us out of a tough situation.

reviews.name: Janell W.
reviews.content: They were awesome!! Very helpful amazing!!!

reviews.name: Mary-Jo M.
reviews.content: If you are looking for an attorney who will thoroughly educate you as to your options, whether they include filing bankruptcy or not, Eric Schwab is a great choice.

reviews.name: Robert K.
reviews.content: Eric and Tom are phenomenal. I was referred to him by a former bankruptcy attorney here in Sacramento. His exact words were: "If I were to have to go through bankruptcy and had a choice to use any attorney in Sacramento, I would definitely choose Eric."

reviews.name: Nichole P.
reviews.content: Quick update to my previous review of N&S: The attorney that I worked with, Tom Amberg, now has his own firm (called Amberg Harvey). Eric is awesome, but I worked with Tom, so I wanted everyone to be aware that he is no longer at N&S.

reviews.name: Scott B.
reviews.content: My experience was with Tom Amberg. From the minute I talked to him on the phone I felt at ease and I didn't feel like he was trying to take advantage of my situation.

reviews.name: N O.
reviews.content: Very knowledgeable. I have talked to a number of attorneys. Tom Amberg is extremely knowledgeable. Some of the questions are pretty sticky. He's also very helpful and actually cares.
